detail_desc: 5-pocket jeans in stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and super-skinny legs.

5-pocket jeans in washed denim with a regular waist, button fly and slim, straight legs. The jeans are made from selvedge denim, a high-quality denim woven on traditional shuttle looms with a distinctive red and white selvedge that stops the fabric from unravelling.

5-pocket jeans in washed denim with a regular waist, button fly and slim, straight legs. The jeans are made from selvedge denim, a high-quality denim woven on traditional shuttle looms with a distinctive red and white selvedge that stops the fabric from unravelling.
Jeans in washed denim with a regular waist, button fly, side pockets, back pockets and traces of a coin pocket that has been removed. Slim, straight legs.
Jeans in washed denim with a regular waist, button fly, side pockets, back pockets and traces of a coin pocket that has been removed. Slim, straight legs.
Cap in cotton corduroy with a contrasting colour peak and appliqué. Adjustable plastic fastener at the back.

Short sports shorts in fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, mesh key pocket in the waistband and short slits at the hems. The polyester content of the shorts is partly recycled.

Short sports shorts in fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, mesh key pocket in the waistband and short slits at the hems. The polyester content of the shorts is partly recycled.
Fitted vest top in soft organic cotton jersey with lace trims around the neckline and armholes.
Hat in a soft knit with faux fur pompoms on top, a double-layered hem, earflaps and ties under the chin. Fleece lining.
Long-sleeved jumper in rib-knit cotton with short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Long-sleeved jumper in rib-knit cotton with short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.

Short, cold shoulder lace dress with a second layer of lace at the top that continues over the arms. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a concealed zip at the back, seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Lined.
Short, off-the-shoulder dress in soft organic cotton jersey with short sleeves.
Shortie briefs in microfibre and lace with a high waist, lined gusset, low-cut legs and cutaway coverage at the back.
Short skirt in an airy weave with an elasticated waist and tiers at the sides. Lined.
Short skirt in an airy weave with an elasticated waist and tiers at the sides. Lined.
Jumper in a soft cotton knit with a high, ribbed stand-up collar and zip at the top. Long sleeves, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Jumper in a soft cotton knit with a high, ribbed stand-up collar and zip at the top. Long sleeves, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Treggings in organic cotton corduroy with an elasticated waist, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Jumper in soft, jacquard-knit cotton with an open chest pocket and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs. Soft brushed inside.
Nightdress in soft modal jersey with a V-neck and a contrasting colour lace trim at the top, under the bust and at the hem. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back.
Ankle boots in imitation leather with a padded top edge and lacing with speed hooks at the front. Satin linings and insoles and chunky rubber soles. Heel 6.5 cm.
Ankle boots in imitation leather with a padded top edge and lacing with speed hooks at the front. Satin linings and insoles and chunky rubber soles. Heel 6.5 cm.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Super push-up lace bra with decorative straps at the front and underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.

Super push-up lace bra with decorative straps at the front and underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.
Brazilian briefs in microfibre and lace with ties, a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and half-string back.

Briefs in microfibre with lace trims, a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.

Top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front, long raglan sleeves and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

All-in-one suit in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood, zip down the front and pockets in the side seams. Long sleeves with ribbed cuffs and long legs with ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.

Long, padded jacket with a hood, zip and concealed press-studs down the front, and side pockets. Polyester filling.
